studioName: Studio name must be a string and have at least 5 characters
studioNumber: Studio phone number must be in Egyptian mobile phone format
studioEmail: Studio email must be in a valid format
desc: Description must be a string and have at least 10 characters
location.lat: Latitude must be a decimal number between -90 and 90
location.lng: Longitude must be a decimal number between -180 and 180
searchKeywords: Search keywords must be an array
searchKeywords.*: Each search keyword must contain at least 3 characters
pricePerHour: Price per hour must be a positive decimal number
insurance: Insurance value must be a positive decimal number
showOnHome: Show on home value must be a boolean
equipments: Equipment list must contain at least one item
equipments.*.name: Equipment name must be a string
equipments.*.fees: Equipment fees must be a positive decimal number
creatives.*.fees: Creative fees must be a positive decimal number
invitedCreatives: Invited creatives must be an array
invitedCreatives.*.phoneNumber: Phone number must be an object
invitedCreatives.*.phoneNumber.number: Invited creative's phone number must be in Egyptian mobile phone format
invitedCreatives.*.fees: Invited creative's fees must be a positive decimal number
tags.*: Tag must be a string and contain at least 3 characters
updateProjectId: Update project ID must be valid
updateStudioName: Update studio name must be a string and have at least 5 characters
updateStudioNumber: Update studio phone number must be in Egyptian mobile phone format
updateStudioEmail: Update studio email must be in a valid format
updateDesc: Update description must be a string and have at least 10 characters
updateLocation.lat: Update latitude must be a decimal number between -90 and 90
updateLocation.lng: Update longitude must be a decimal number between -180 and 180
updateSearchKeywords: Update search keywords must be an array
updateSearchKeywords.*: Each update search keyword must contain at least 3 characters
updatePricePerHour: Update price per hour must be a positive decimal number
updateInsurance: Update insurance value must be a positive decimal number
updateShowOnHome: Update show on home value must be a boolean
updateCreatives: Creatives for update must be an array
updateInvitedCreatives: Invited creatives for update must be an array
updateTags: Tags for update must be an array
updateSubCategory: Update subcategory ID must be valid
updateEquipmentId: Update equipment ID must be valid
addProjectId: Project ID for addition must be valid
name: Name must be a string
fees: Fees must be a positive decimal number
equipmentName: Equipment name for addition must be a string
equipmentFees: Equipment fees for addition must be a positive decimal number
deleteEquipmentId: Equipment ID for deletion must be valid
deleteProjectId: Project ID for deletion must be valid
pricePerHourFrom: Price per hour from must be numeric
pricePerHourTo: Price per hour to must be numeric
startDate: Start date must be in ISO8601 format
endDate: End date must be in ISO8601 format
limit: Limit must be a valid integer greater than 0
page: Page must be a valid integer greater than 0
jobDetails: Job details must be a string
equipments.*: Each equipment ID must be valid
bookingHours: Booking hours must be an integer
appointmentDate: Appointment date must be in ISO8601 format
deadline: Deadline must be in ISO8601 format
